sqlCreate: CREATE TABLE if not exists USER(UUID NVARCHAR2(32) NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,UUNAME NVARCHAR2(100) NOT NULL, WORD CHAR(32) NOT NULL, EXPARM NVARCHAR2(6000) ) WITHOUT ROWID;

CREATE TABLE if not exists ARTICLE(UUID CHAR(32) NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, ID CHAR(32) NOT NULL, TITLE NVARCHAR2(255), allDay, CONTENT NVARCHAR2(10000),VIDEOLINK NVARCHAR2(1000),IMGLINK NVARCHAR2(1000),RECNAME NVARCHAR2(20),RECTIME VARCHAR(20) ) WITHOUT ROWID;
CREATE INDEX if not exists [idx_article_id] ON [ARTICLE] ([ID] DESC);
CREATE INDEX if not exists [idx_article_parentid] ON [ARTICLE] ([PARENTID] DESC);
